mūsila： mūsila（pu）
မူသိလ（ပု）

Mūsila：1．Mūsila （v．l．Musīla，Musila）．Devadatta born as the chief musician of Ujjeni．For his story see the Guttila Jātaka．

2．Mūsila Thera．A monk．A conversation is recorded in theSamyutta Nikāya （S．ii．115f ） between him and Savittha，which is said to have taken place in Ghositārāma in Kosambī，regarding the paticcasamuppāda．

mūsila：မူသိလ（ပု）

မူသိလမည်သူ။
